author: gbg
msg: On the invoke-merge-cmd-feature: Create a new branch from 1538071

author: rhuijben
msg: Tweak some wc.db query usages in preparation for changing
(STMT_DELETE_NODE): Redefine with additional argument, as this name
didn't explain the true behavior anyway.
(STMT_DELETE_NODE_ALL_LAYERS): ... this, to document that it removes
all layers of a node by its name.
(svn_wc__db_retract_parent_delete): Implement logic in c that used to be
performed in sqlite to allow handling other cases. Document what needs
to be fixed. As this function is only used within sqlite transactions
there is no measurable performance impact.
commit_node): Use STMT_DELETE_NODE_ALL_LAYERS instead of the old,
